markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Viking Shieldbearer](/Feats.aspx?ID=948) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 13 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Access**
Ulfen ethnicity

</column>

---

You trained with shields and weapons as soon as you were old enough to hold them, eager to win honor and glory for yourself. You gain the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction and are trained in your choice of the battle axe or longsword.
name: Viking Shieldbearer
